name: Colgate
summary: Colgate is an American multinational oral care brand owned by Colgate-Palmolive. Although many products are manufactured in India, the company ownership and profits belong to a foreign corporation.

name: Nike
summary: Nike is an American sportswear brand. Products sold in India are imported or manufactured in Asian factories outside Indian ownership.

name: Apple
summary: Apple is an American technology company. Some iPhones are assembled in India but the company remains foreign owned.

name: Head & Shoulders
summary: Head & Shoulders is an American anti-dandruff shampoo brand owned by Procter & Gamble. Products sold in India are manufactured locally but the brand is foreign owned.

name: Pantene
summary: Pantene is a global haircare brand owned by Procter & Gamble. Although widely sold in India, the company ownership and profits belong to a foreign corporation.

name: Dove
summary: Dove is a personal care brand owned by Unilever, a multinational company headquartered in the UK. Many products are manufactured in India but the brand remains foreign owned.

name: Sunsilk
summary: Sunsilk is a haircare brand owned by Unilever. Though widely available and produced in India, it is not an Indian company.

name: Tresemme
summary: Tresemme is an American-origin haircare brand owned by Unilever. Products sold in India are locally produced but profits go to a foreign parent company.

name: Garnier
summary: Garnier is a French cosmetics and haircare brand owned by L'Oréal. Despite manufacturing in India, it remains a foreign brand.
